description: Moty's Grill is simple and based on healthy, fresh and affordable food. Our famous falafel sandwich is made with fresh baked pita bread filled with crispy, handmade Falafel balls which are made from chickpeas, a vitamin rich legume, filled with proteins, minerals and vitamin B.The chickpeas are blended daily with fresh spices and vegetables and then fried in Canola oil. All of our salads and sauces are freshly prepared every day using carefully selected ingredients to assure superior quality and freshness.We only use Kosher ingredients of the highest quality, and we observe all the rules and practices of Kashrut; however, we are not Kosher certified by any authority.
name: Moty's Grill
